original: assert (H : dp_size (dp_common e) <= 3 + (1 + 7 * df_size (dee_to_df e))). { apply Nat.le_trans with (m := 3 + dp_size (dp_par (dp_nat 3))). - apply dp_common_size. - rewrite dp_par_size. simpl. lia. } apply Nat.le_trans with (m := 3 + (1 + 7 * df_size (dee_to_df e))). - apply H. - lia.
